description: Registrations emails will be sent to these email addresses.
name: admin_emails
label: Admin Emails

description: Event minimal add form is enabled or not.
name: minimaladdform
label: Minimal Event Add Enabled

description: If true, registrants should be able to select a different pricing for each additional registrant. Guests will be validated based on the email address that is entered.
name: anonymousmemberpricing
label: Anonymous Member Pricing Enabled

description: If true and anonymous member pricing is enabled, Users will also be able to validate pricings based on memberid.
name: memberidpricing
label: Member ID Pricing

description: If true and anonymous member pricing is enabled, Users will be able to share registration pricings in a registration.
name: sharedpricing
label: Shared Pricing

description: Custom registration form is enabled or not.
name: customregformenabled
label: Custom Registration Form Enabled

description:
This setting controls how people can register for your events. Choose one of the following options:

1. Open - Allows people registering for events to choose any price for themselves and their guests.
2. Validated - Allows people to see all prices when registering, but they will need to enter a valid email address for each price to check that they qualify. They do not have to be logged in, and they can register guests using the guests' email addresses.
3. Strict - Requires people to be logged in to register. The rest is the same as the validated.
name: anonymousregistration
label: Anonymous Event Registration

description: If true, member ID is required for registering with member pricing.
name: requiresmemberid
label: Event Registration Requires member ID for member pricing

description: If true, only the primary registrant will need to follow the event reg setting (strict, validated, open).
name: validateprimaryregonly
label: Validate Primary Registrant Only
